name: The Daily Zoo - Vol. 1 Paperback
description: The Daily Zoo - Vol. 1 Keeping the Doctor at Bay with a Drawing a Day by Chris Ayers foreword by J.J. Abrams PAPERBACK VERSION (also available in HARDCOVER) Join Chris on his journey as he keeps the doctor at bay with a drawing a day through the first year of The Daily Zoo project which he started a year after being diagnosed with cancer. Filled with page after page of whimsical animal drawings and Chris' reflections on his experience with leukemia, The Daily Zoo will likely make you laugh, perhaps make you cry, but it will most certainly warm your heart. FEEL-GOOD BONUS: A portion of the proceeds from The Daily Zoo goes to cancer-related charities! • 160 pages • 365 illustrations • Artist commentary and reflection If you would like a SIGNED copy (no extra charge) please be sure to select the 'signed' option below. If you would like it inscribed to a particular person and/or would like to request an animal sketch next to the signature please send an email to orders@chrisayersdesign.com. (Note: signed copies may delay the shipping of your order by a few days, depending on the author's availability.)

name: The Daily Zoo - Year 2 Paperback
description: The Daily Zoo - Year Two Still Keeping the Doctor at Bay with a Drawing a Day by Chris Ayers PAPERBACK VERSION (also available in HARDCOVER) Follow along with cancer survivor Chris as he continues to celebrate the gift of each healthy day by drawing whimsical and zany animal characters through the second year of The Daily Zoo, the project he started after facing leukemia. FEEL-GOOD BONUS: A portion of the proceeds from The Daily Zoo goes to cancer-related charities! • 160 pages • 366 illustrations • Artist commentary and reflection If you would like a SIGNED copy (no extra charge) please be sure to select the 'signed' option below. If you would like it inscribed to a particular person and/or would like to request an animal sketch next to the signature please send an email to orders@chrisayersdesign.com. (Note: signed copies may delay the shipping of your order by a few days, depending on the author's availability.)

name: Eye to Eye Giraffes Infant One-piece
description: Eye to Eye Giraffes Infant One-piece The ever popular Eye to Eye Giraffes from The Daily Zoo are now available as a one-piece. A perfect gift for all the future giraffe lovers in your life! Color: White Size: 6 mos. 100% cotton and printed with eco-friendly waterbased inks for a soft, natural feel.

name: The Ayers Zoo 2012 Exhibition Catalog
description: The Ayers Zoo 2012 Lucca Exhibition Catalog In the fall of 2012, Chris had an exhibition of his work in Lucca, Italy as part of the annual Lucca Comics and Games festival. This limited edition catalog contains almost all of the images in the exhibit, many of them never-before-published. NOTE: The image titles are in English, but everything else is in Italian. • Paperback • 8" x 8" • 24 pages

name: MY Daily Zoo - Drawing Activity Book
description: MY Daily Zoo - A Drawing Activity Book for All Ages by Chris Ayers...and YOU! Chris' latest offering from the world of the Daily Zoo allows YOU to join in the drawing fun! MY Daily Zoo includes a whopping 96 pages of imagination-stretching drawing activities to jumpstart YOUR creativity! When you dive into MY Daily Zoo you'll: • Learn some simple drawing tips and follow along in easy step-by-step exercises to draw whimsical animal characters. • Take artistic adventures to places such as a circus, rodeo, and jungle and populate a coral reef with fish of your own design. • Exercise and explore YOUR imagination. • And much, much more! Makes a great gift for all the budding artists in your life! • 96 pages, softcover • approx. 75 full or partial b&w illustrations to complete and color • more sample pages can be viewed on my website HERE If you would like a SIGNED copy (no extra charge) please be sure to select the 'signed' option below. If you would like it inscribed to a particular person and/or would like to request an animal sketch next to the signature please send an email to orders@chrisayersdesign.com. (Note: signed copies may delay the shipping of your order by a few days, depending on the author's availability.) FEEL-GOOD BONUS: A portion of the proceeds from MY Daily Zoo goes to cancer-related charities!

name: The Daily Zoo Goes to Paris!
description: The Daily Zoo Goes to Paris! The latest book in The Daily Zoo series, The Daily Zoo Goes to Paris! features the 58 previously-unpublished pieces that were in the January 2012 Daily Zoo exhibition in The City of Lights (plus a few surprises). If you couldn't make it to the exhibition in person, this is the next best thing! Sample pages can be viewed on Chris' website here. FEEL-GOOD BONUS: A portion of the proceeds from The Daily Zoo goes to cancer-related charities! • Hardcover • 64 pages • 8" x 8" • over 70 illustrations in full color • Artist commentary and reflection If you would like a SIGNED copy (no extra charge) please be sure to select the 'signed' option below. If you would like it inscribed to a particular person and/or would like to request an animal sketch next to the signature please send an email to orders@chrisayersdesign.com. (Note: signed copies may delay the shipping of your order by a few days, depending on the author's availability.)

name: The Daily Zoo Notecards
description: The Daily Zoo Notecards Variety Pack • 12 cards total (4x6 inches) with envelopes • 2 cards each of: - Drop of Cardinal (day 011) - Giraffe (day 063) - Penguin (Ambition - day 146) - Goldfish (Stuck - day 173) - Tortoise (Finished at the Finish - day 365) - Tiger (Content Kitty - day 466) • Cards are blank inside If you are one of the few remaining people in this world who still likes to send greetings and goodwill through physical cards rather than cyberspace, you'll love these Daily Zoo notecards. Also for sale are boxes of a single design (12 cards of any one of the designs listed above). Individual notecards are available for $2.00 each.
